name: Probably mrthesoulz
body:
- - - -

If you would like to help out, code contributions, feedback, error reports are more then welcome :)

About: ============================ MrTheSoulz Profiles For ProbablyEngine. This file lists all the rotation specific stuff bellow. My profile requires the latest Version of PE from GITHUB Download link: https://github.com/ProbablyEngine/Probably If you encounter any issues, report them at the forums. http://pe.phelps.io/forums/viewtopic.php?id=70&p=1 Motivation: Own use and contributing to the PE comunity. Having a fast and reliable rotation that does not use all your resources like other bots.

Paladin - Protection:

``` Control: Fist of Justice OR Hammer of Justice Shift: Light´s Hammer Alt: Consecration IF glyphed ```

Paladin - Holy:

``` Shift: Light´s Hammer Alt: Mouseover Focus ```

DeathKnight:

``` Control: Death Grip Shift: Death and Decay Alt: Army of the Dead ```

Priest:

``` Right Control: Mass Dispel Right Shift: Power Word: Barrier Right Alt: Mind Sear Left Control: Cascade / Halo / Divine Star Left Shift Spirit Shell ```

Warrior

``` Alt: Charge ``` Donate Link: http://goo.gl/yrctPO --------------------------------------------------------------- How to install & use: ============================ * Extract the file. * Remove -master from folder name. * Load World of Warcraft. * Right-click PE addon and choose the rotation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
